directions: Place half the sausage in a slow cooker, and top with the sauerkraut.  Cover with the remaining sausage, apples, and onion.  Top with the potatoes.  Pour chicken broth over all, and sprinkle with caraway seeds.
Cover, and cook on High 4 hours, or until potatoes are tender.  Top each serving with Swiss cheese.
ingredients: 2 pounds kielbasa sausage, cut into 1 inch pieces
2 Granny Smith apples - peeled, cored and sliced into rings
title: Slow Cooker Kielbasa Stew
